features: 【High-quality Material】: CLAKBLRG womens loafers made of soft leather,feels smooth and soft.Make your feet comfort when you wear it.

【Breathable Leather lining】:Different from other loafer shoes,CLAKBLRG loafers made of genuine leather lining and removable memory foam insole,provides a good arch support,making bare feet more breathable and natural to wear.
【Flexible & Lightweight Oxford Outsole】:Solid anti slip pattern has great slip resistance,lightweight Oxford Outsole offer all-day comfort, make you fall for walking.
【Classic Retro Design】: The retro golden waxen thread looks more stylish,slip-on design for easy on and off,no need to break in.Classic Oxfords are perfect for the office work or interviews.

【Gift Ideas】: CLAKBLRG loafers for women with an eye-catching look are the perfect gift for your wife,girlfriend or your daughter.Nice dress shoes can match with work dress, uniform,jeans and casual wear

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The chunky sole not only adds a fashionable edge but also provides excellent support and cushioning
reviews.reviewText: they have quickly become a favorite for several reasons, especially with the current chunky sole trend.First and foremost, these loafers strike the perfect balance between style and comfort. The chunky sole not only adds a fashionable edge but also provides excellent support and cushioning, making them ideal for all-day wear.The leather construction of the loafers is not only durable but also adds a touch of sophistication. The black color, in particular, gives them a classic and versatile look that pairs well with various outfits, from casual to more dressed-up ensembles.Slipping into these loafers is a breeze, thanks to their slip-on design. The lightweight and breathable nature of the shoes make them perfect for warmer days, ensuring that my feet stay comfortable and well-ventilated.What sets these loafers apart is their flexibility. The driving moccasin style allows for natural movement, making them incredibly comfortable for activities that involve being on your feet for extended periods.I've found these loafers to be particularly versatile. Whether I'm running errands, heading to the office, or going for a casual outing, they seamlessly transition from one occasion to another. The chunky sole trend adds a contemporary flair, making them a stylish choice for various settings.The size 8.5 US fits true to size, providing a comfortable and snug fit without any need for breaking in. The attention to detail in the craftsmanship is evident, and it reflects in the overall quality of the shoes.In summary, the CLAKBLRG Women's Leather Loafers have become my go-to shoes, especially in embracing the chunky sole trend. They effortlessly combine fashion and functionality, offering a comfortable and stylish option for everyday wear. If you're on the lookout for loafers that align with current trends while prioritizing comfort, these leather loafers are a fantastic choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally found the right pair of Loafers!
reviews.reviewText: Have been looking for a pair of comfortable loafers for a long time now. Ordered several recognizable brands but had to return them. As soon as I tried them on, I had issues with them. Most were not comfortable, or the back would slip off as I tried to walk. I found these on Amazon and based on the verified reviews, I took a chance. I’m glad I did! As soon as I put them on and took a step, my foot didn’t slip off and my feet had plenty of room. They are soft and super comfortable. The best part, I saw that the insoles were removable and that was a huge plus for me! Since I have many issues with my feet, I immediately ordered a pair of Vionic Relief Insoles and switched them out! I am 8 1/2 in open shoes but based on the reviews, I ordered 8 1/2 and these loafers are perfect. The insoles that worked for me were the small size. I love these loafers so much that I just ordered a pair of black and blue ones. Since I stand on my feet and do a lot of walking at work, I know that these shoes will be my go to pair! The best thing is that they were 20 percent off! I plan on getting the red ones too! I will just switch my Vionic insoles into the pair I decide to wear! If you are wondering, the insoles do not make these shoes tighter in the contrary super comfy! If you are on fence about grabbing a pair, don’t hesitate. I included pictures of the insoles these come with and the ones I plan on using for extra support!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking shoe! Good quality!
reviews.reviewText: These are very stylish and fit pretty true to size. They have a roomy toe box which I need. While comfortable, I’m not sure these would be a shoe I could be on my feet in ALL day. There is not much cushioning or arch support. I also doubt they are leather as mentioned in the description. Overall I’m happy with the purchase for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous red shoes ❤️❤️❤️
reviews.reviewText: These shoes are super comfortable. They’re soft and there’s no need to break them in. I usually wear my new shoes around a house first to break them in but there was no need for that. I got red and they’re gorgeous. The sole, the stitching and all the craftsmanship is executed flawlessly. These are not genuine leather shoes but they look like they are. Very happy with both the quality and visual appearance

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: All positive reviews are true !!! I am amazed how comfortable and good looking those are! Even though it's not real leather- they don't look plastic , they are soft, don't slip off, and comfortable out of the box . Seriously considering getting another pair in a different color just because they fit so well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very cute but...
reviews.reviewText: These shoes are very cute. I ordered my regular size 7.5 and they were way too wide. If you have a wide foot these might work for you. Also, not leather.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Shoes came nicely packaged, plastic insert in side the shoe to keep their shape. I order the burgundy but from another review l knew it was a dark red. It matches my Patrica Nash handbag perfectly. The question is whether the shoe is leather. I am not sure. The inside is beautifully lined, the out side material is soft just like the video shows. Sole is flexible. I wear a size 8.5 For me the shoe is a perfect fit, just wide enough to accommodate a pair of socks, but l can also wear them without a sock and the heel does not slip. No rubbing, no pain, no break in period. Best pair of shoes l purchase in a long time. If they’re not leather l will trade that for comfort. Would l buy them again, absolutely plan on getting a second pair after the Holidays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Short in length, too big on upper
reviews.reviewText: Super cute in theory, but length is short and the uppers are soft, but too big. Insane shoe fit
